title: Unable to toggle OEM unlock setting on OG Pixel Verizon. Android 9 (Mar 2019 security updates).
content: Not it is encouraged, I want to install a custom ROM on my Pixel.  Followed few XDA posts but with no success. Also, it might be due to being a Verizon phone and not purchased directly from Google. Any suggestions or tips are welcome. Otherwise, I will continue to use the phone in the current state.
